I lived down the street from this place for three months and I couldn't have been happier about it . Craft beer is obviously big in America but this is so much different because wildly expensive beers in America were cheap here so were able to try many beers we wouldn't have been able to otherwise . The staff couldn't have been nicer and more welcoming . We were truly lucky to live so close to this gem and if you're ever in the area I would highly recommend paying la bona pinta a visit .
